column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " How did your brother end up becoming Amon ? "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " It all began with my father , Yakone .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I 'm trying , but - " Yakone says : " Try harder !
#Text=Your brother was never this sloppy .
#Text=" Noatak says : " Dad , he 'll get it .
#Text=He just needs time .
#Text=" Yakone says : " Do n't talk back to me , son !
#Text=Ever !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Even back then , my brother wanted everyone to be treated fairly and equally .
#Text=When I was seven , my father took me and Noatak on a hunting trip far away from our home .
#Text=He told us his true identity was Yakone , Republic City 's most notorious crime boss , and that he was once a bloodbender of rare skill .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " What 's bloodbending ?
#Text=" Yakone says : " The most powerful and feared form of bending in the world .
#Text=It was declared illegal thanks to that coward , Katara .
#Text=Our family has the strongest line of bloodbenders in history .
#Text=You boys have this power inside of you , and I will teach you to master it .
#Text=" Noatak says : " What happened to your bending , Dad ?
#Text=" Yakone says : " The Avatar stole it from me .
#Text=That 's why I brought you out here , to learn your destiny .
#Text=You two will become bloodbenders of the highest order .
#Text=When the time is right , you will claim Republic City and you will destroy the Avatar .
#Text=You must avenge me .
#Text=That is your purpose in life .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " The good days were behind us .
#Text=Every full moon , our father took us on another supposed " hunting trip , " where he secretly trained us in bloodbending .
#Text=We kept the truth from my mother .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Stop !
#Text=You 're hurting it !
#Text=" Yakone says : " Toughen up , Tarrlok !
#Text=You 'll need a thicker skin for this .
#Text=Very good , son , very good .
#Text="
